name: What if...
description:
What if...

What if you could go back in time to undo a mistake?

What if you could stop the time?

Find out in the first chapter of the story of Phos!

Instructions:

-Use the Arrow keys or WASD to move;

-Use K or Space bar to jump;

Use J or Left Ctrl for ability

If you like the game please leave a comment and share it with your friends.

Any donations will help for further development.

Windows/Mac/Linux versions comming soon!
